tool_description: Determines appropriate tax classifications, filing requirements, and tax obligations based on taxpayer profile and business activities.

taxpayer_type.description: Type of taxpayer (individual, business, non_profit, government)

business_activities.description: List of primary business activities or industry codes

employee_count.description: Number of employees for business entities

multi_state_operations.description: Whether business operates in multiple states

special_circumstances.description: Special tax circumstances (foreign_income, agricultural, medical, etc.)

error_messages: Invalid taxpayer type: Use one of [individual, business, non_profit, government]
Invalid income amount: Annual income must be a positive number
Missing business activities: Business taxpayers must specify at least one business activity
Invalid employee count: Employee count must be zero or positive integer
Unrecognized business activity: One or more business activities are not valid industry codes
usage: Specify taxpayer type and annual income, add business activities for business entities. Tool analyzes profile and determines applicable tax classifications and requirements.

applicable_tax_rates.description: Applicable tax rates for different categories
